mapper.insert: insert into user (uuid, id, nickname, password, user_type, join_date, email) values (UUID(), #{id}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{userType}, now(), #{email})
mapper.select: select uuid, id, nickname, join_date, user_type, email from user where nickname like '%${nickname}%'
select uuid, id, nickname, join_date, user_type, email from user
